mil7.2.3:1.1: “Bhante nagasena, ‘kalandakassa ekam angam gahetabban’ti yam vadesi, katamam tam ekam angam gahetabban”ti?
mil7.2.3:1.2: “Yatha, maharaja, kalandako patisattumhi opatante nanguttham papphotetva mahantam katva teneva nangutthalagulena patisattum patibahati;
mil7.2.3:1.3: evameva kho, maharaja, yogina yogavacarena kilesasattumhi opatante satipatthanalagulam papphotetva mahantam katva teneva satipatthanalagulena sabbakilesa patibahitabba.
mil7.2.3:1.4: Idam, maharaja, kalandakassa ekam angam gahetabbam.
